sodas.name: Coca-Cola
sodas.description: A carbonated cola beverage known for its sweet and refreshing taste. It is one of the most popular brands worldwide.

sodas.name: Pepsi
sodas.description: A cola beverage similar to Coca-Cola, known for its slightly sweeter and less acidic flavor.

sodas.name: Sprite
sodas.description: A lemon-lime carbonated drink known for its refreshing and caffeine-free taste.

sodas.name: Fanta
sodas.description: A carbonated beverage with an orange flavor, famous for its fruity taste and vibrant color.

sodas.name: Dr Pepper
sodas.description: A carbonated drink with a unique flavor based on a blend of 23 different flavors.

sodas.name: Mountain Dew
sodas.description: A citrus-flavored carbonated drink, known for its high caffeine content and bright green color.

sodas.name: 7 Up
sodas.description: A lemon-lime carbonated drink, similar to Sprite but with a distinctive flavor.

sodas.name: Schweppes
sodas.description: Known for its tonic water, Schweppes offers a variety of carbonated drinks with different flavors like tonic and ginger ale.

sodas.name: Inca Kola
sodas.description: A carbonated drink originating from Peru, known for its distinctive bubblegum flavor and golden color.

sodas.name: Jarritos
sodas.description: A Mexican soda brand, famous for its variety of fruity flavors such as tamarind, mango, and guava.
